name: The 6th Annual Banking and Finance Conference 2016
content: The 6th Edition of the Africa Banking & Finance Conference (ABFC 2016) will held in Accra Ghana on the 1-2 June 2016 under a timely theme: “Promoting Financial Inclusion: Connecting people to Banking & Financial Service” couldn’t be timelier. The agenda to deliver financial services to those that banks have traditionally not reached should now more than ever be at the top of corporate growth strategy. The objective of this flagship 2016 event is to sharpen the focus of thinking on how financial institutions can grow by focusing on promoting financial inclusion as a core part of their business strategies while at the same providing a client centered products in the mass market. The conference will also look at new and innovative financial technology solutions that will make financial inclusion possible and profitable.
